# Basics of ggplot

```{r include}
library(ggplot2)
data(Galton, package = "mosaicData")
```

```{r}
names(Galton)
```

```{r}
Galton %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = mother, y = height)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = sex, color = sex)) +
  facet_grid(. ~ sex) +
  geom_smooth()
```
